vsthespire:agony.NAME: Agony
vsthespire:agony.DESCRIPTION: Lose X HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

vsthespire:judged.NAME: Judged
vsthespire:judged.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, die.

vsthespire:lamentation.NAME: Lamentation
vsthespire:lamentation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL At the end of your turn, set your HP to 1 and Exhaust.

vsthespire:paralysis.NAME: Paralysis
vsthespire:paralysis.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust. NL Lose X HP when Exhausted. NL Decrease it's damage by 5 when Retained.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTIONS: Retain. NL Exhaust. NL Lose !M! HP when Exhausted. NL Decrease it's damage by 5 when Retained.

vsthespire:poison.NAME: Poison
vsthespire:poison.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you haven't this turn, lose HP equal to your current Poison and Exhaust.
